metadata.synopsis: There's already a bigger conversation before in the IRN_IronThrone_Return dialog, so this is more of a hasmet to direct the players that further conversations will happen in camp.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Ravengard while you're still in the submersible when you get back, before he has left.

0.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
0.text: I'll get to your camp. We'll talk there.
